EmailTemplate.description: Sends email when EIN Received date is entered.
EmailTemplate.name: EIN Received - Disregarded LLC
EmailTemplate.subject: EIN Received from the IRS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Entities__c.AccName__c},
We have received the Employer Identification Number (EIN) for {!Entities__c.Name}.
EIN: {!Entities__c.EIN__c} Tax Year End Date: {!Entities__c.Year_End__c}
The organization will be treated as a disregarded entity for federal income tax purposes. As a {!Entities__c.Tax_Status__c}, your organization will not file a separate return each year.
The EIN is also very important for opening a bank account* and conducting business in general.
A copy of your EIN application is included with your entity documents in Box or your Platinum Portal.
*Please do not attempt to open your entity bank account now. You will be able to do this once your documents are complete.
Platinum Members: Log into your Platinum Portal to see real-time status of your new company via the Entity Tracker.
Thank you, Anderson Business Advisors, LLC
